Text: Track 3, Disc 1 should be titled "A Message to Pretty" -- sorry. That's what I get for cutting & pasting the track list from Amazon.

Geez, Amazon got many of these titles wrong! They looked OK originally.  Here are the corrections:  "A Message to Pretty," "You I'll Be Following," "She Comes in Colors,"Everybody's Gotta Live" and "ยกQue Vida!"
